member.name: T:Fujitsu.eCrm.Seoul.PosSocketsService.PosSocketsService
member.summary: Provides a service that responds to PosGet/PosSet requests. A clone of the Kofi POSSocketsService project, but using Tesco format sockets.

version.description: Replace existing single port implementation with read of port information from database and creation of a listener for each intoduction port and transaction port
Added call to XmlApplication.Close in OnStop. Amended call to XmlApplication.Intialise in OnStart.

member.summary: PosGet receives card number, and responds with customer details

The name of the card's primary customer
The points balance of the card's household
The number of points converted since previous visit
If this first time the card is used then specify x points to be added to the card account
The primary card of the householder
The customers unique number
The points balance for extra points type 1
The points balance for extra points type 1
The points balance for extra points type 1
The store code that is sending the messge
The Status of PosGet, 0=success, otherwise an error or warning

member.summary: PosSet receives card and txn details, it updates card and household accounts
member.param: The number of the card that has been swiped
The default nameto use when creatinga skeleton customer
The type of POS
The type of Transaction (normal, cancelled, returned)
The store where the card is used
The date & time of the transaction
The number of the POS terminal
The transaction number of the POS terminal
The operator behind the POS
The amount spent by the customer
The number of standard points to award the customer
The number of welcome points to award the customer, e.g. welcome points
The number of SKU points to award the customer, e.g. points for buying a product
The number of extra points (culture specific?) to award the customer, e.g. points for buying a product
The number of extra points (culture specific?) to award the customer, e.g. points for buying a product
The number of extra points (culture specific?) to award the customer, e.g. points for buying a product
The Status of PosGet, 0=success, otherwise an error
